des.main: Managed the team consisting of 4 team members to release the AI SaaS (software as a service) project.
Developed a full-stack web application using Frappe framework that is created on Oracle server to be accessible from websites and Android devices using:
sub: Project design: Adobe XD.
Team management: Jira.

Front-end using (HTML/CSS/JavaScript - Vue.js - Jinja).
Back-end (Redis - MariaDB/MySQL - REST API - Flask).
Oracle server handling: Docker - Web hosting control panel Hestia.
AI model: CLIP (Contrastive Language-Image Pre-training).

des.main: Project idea: search for an image from a huge dataset using text meaning then predict image popularity to know which image will get high interaction.
Integrated with Google and Facebook to get user data and share posts to social media profiles.
Created a web scraper that collects images from Instagram to train the AI model.
Primary technologies used in the project:
sub: React: Frontend framework for building user interfaces.
Express: Backend framework for server-side logic and API routes.
React Router DOM: Navigation inside the React application.
Google Cloud Run: Serverless platform for deploying the application.
Google Analytics: Collect website usage data and analyze behavior.

des.main: Make a new .env file and replace placeholders with your specific data.

sub: Language: Python.

des.main: Created a VR site with 3DoF that shows the Solar System on a real-time video background captured by the camera using HTML, JS, and A-Frame.
This VR experience allows you to explore the Solar System within a real-time video background captured by your camera.
sub: HTML: Provides the structure for the webpage.
JavaScript: Enables interactivity and manipulation of the 3D scene.
A-Frame: Web framework for building VR experiences with HTML components.

des.main: Features:
sub: Real-time background: the camera captures your surroundings and displays them as the background of the VR scene.
3DoF head tracking: move your head to control the viewpoint.
Solar System objects: planets and moons represented in 3D models.
Scalability: the VR scene can be scaled to fit your physical space.

des.main: Benefits:
sub: Engaging learning tool for Solar System education.
Immersive exploration that fosters curiosity.
Blended reality with real-world background and virtual objects.

des.main: Streamline your WhatsApp communication:
sub: Respond to messages instantly, categorize chats, send targeted broadcasts, and collaborate with your team from one platform.

des.main: Boost productivity and customer satisfaction:
sub: Deliver faster responses, improve customer experience, and grow your business.

des.main: ERPNext is a powerful open-source ERP system designed to centralize business operations:
sub: Unified platform for accounting, sales, inventory, CRM, manufacturing, and projects.
Real-time visibility with dashboards and reporting.
Automate routine tasks and workflows to boost productivity.
Stronger CRM with lead and opportunity management.
Improved inventory control and purchasing decisions.
Simplified project management with tracking and collaboration.
Cost-effective and customizable open-source stack.

des.main: Designed and implemented a real-time chat web application using Socket.io and React.js.
Setup and run:
sub: Make sure ports 3000 and 8002 are free on your machine.
Run npm install in both /backend and /react-app directories.
Open two terminal windows and run npm start in both directories.
